sentence.Network_en: Tantric Sex is meditative, spontaneous and intimate lovemaking.

sentence.Network_en: The Tantric path encompasses beauty, sensitivity, and exhilaration through eating, drinking, tasting, smelling, touching.

sentence.Network_en: Tantric practices use both ritual and meditation to unify the devotee with the chosen deity.
sentence.Network_cn: 坦陀罗练习既使用仪式,也使用静心去把皈依者与所选择的神连接.

entry.tran: 与佛教(或印度教)中某一动作相关的
entry.def: Tantric is used to describe things relating to or connected with a particular movement in Buddhism and Hinduism.

auth_sentence.content: She is a tantric practitioner of the old school of Tibetan Buddhism.
